Package com.blakfx.websocket

Class WebsocketClientEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blakfx.websocket.WebsocketClientEndpoint
  • public class WebsocketClientEndpoint
extends Object
    Representation of a client endpoint to the chat server. Allows a way to connect to the chat server, and to send both text and binary content asynchronously.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  WebsocketClientEndpoint.MessageHandler
      Interface for a MessageHandler for a client.

      • registerIdentity

        public void registerIdentity​(String aUsername)
        Sends an identification request to the chat server. Response handled along other JSON responses in receiveGlobalMessage.
        Parameters:
        aUsername - the name of the user to register with the chat server
